channel.title: holiday stuff
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "holiday stuff"

item.title: Re: holiday stuff
item.content:encoded: Bunny Eggs are still dropping. I got one this morning. As for Sham Rocks, remember you have to be in a village who's activated the Lunar Overclocking device on their Science! Workshop before they'll drop, and even then they'll only drop that one day.

item.title: holiday stuff
item.content:encoded: So can we still get shamrocks and bunnys from romping in the forest? Or does it expire after a while because I've got a bunny the last 2 times I hunted but today I got nothing.
